Property Description

INDIVIDUAL HOUSE NEAR TO PONDICHERRY BEACH FOR RENT

NEAT & CLEAN HOUSE
CALM LOCALITY INSIDE THE TOWN
2 BED ROOMS WITH ATTACHED
1 DRAWING ROOM
DOUBLE HALL
MODULAR KITCHEN
STORE ROOM
COVERED CAR PARKING
NEAR TO BEACH, SCHOOLS, TEMPLES, CHURCHES, ASHRAM AND SHOPPING AREA
PREFERENCE TO FAMILIES AND WORKING PROFROFESSIONALS
FOR LONG TERM RENTAL (MINIMUM 1 YEAR)
BROKERS EXCUSE
